# device

**Instance Property**

The Metal device from which the command encoder was created.

## Declaration

```swift
var device: any MTLDevice { get }
```

## Discussion

This command encoder can only be used with this [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice].

## Identifying the command encoder

- **label**: A string that labels the command encoder.

items.description: A string that labels the command encoder.
items.name: label
